member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction
member.summary: A Function as programmed on the physical dcc decoder in a model engine.

member.name: M:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction.#ctor(System.Byte,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the Function as per Database.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction.Number
member.summary: Gets or sets the dcc function number this function has (F0 or F18 for example).

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.DccFunction.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name that this function should have.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine
member.summary: A choo-choo, in this context generally understood to be smaller than real-live-sized.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the choo-choo.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the Engine in the database system.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.Address
member.summary: Gets or sets the DCC Address of an Engine. Is not necessarily unique.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.SpeedSteps
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of speed steps the decoder supports.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.TopSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the top speed of the real thing.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.SpeedDisplayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the , indicating how the speed of the model should be displayed.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.Functions
member.summary: Gets or sets the functions a decoder offers.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Engine.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of strings that describe an engine. These might be alternative names, manufacturers, the owner etc, basically everything one might search for if the exact name is unknown. TODO: HTMLEncode these before actually displaying them anywhere.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Data.SpeedDisplayType
member.summary: Represents different ways speed of displaying the speed of a model train.

member.name: F:PiStellwerk.Data.SpeedDisplayType.Percent
member.summary: Speed is supposed to be displayed as percent, from 0% to 100%

member.name: F:PiStellwerk.Data.SpeedDisplayType.SpeedSteps
member.summary: Speed is supposed to be displayed as the actual dcc speed steps

member.name: F:PiStellwerk.Data.SpeedDisplayType.TopSpeed
member.summary: Speed is supposed to be displayed as the approximation of speed based on the top speed and speed steps.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Data.Status
member.summary: Status of the dcc output.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Status.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dcc output hardware is running.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.Status.LastActionUsername
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Person who is responsible for the last status change. SYSTEM is the software itself, for example because of the over current protection kicking in.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Data.User
member.summary: A user of the PiStellwerk software. Does not necessarily correspond to actual people.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.User.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the user.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.User.UserAgent
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-agent string of the client the user uses.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.User.LastContact
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp of the last heartbeat received by the application from the user.

member.name: P:PiStellwerk.Data.StwDbContext.Engines
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of engines in the database.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.TestDataService
member.summary: Provides data for testing.

member.name: M:PiStellwerk.TestDataService.GetEngines
member.summary: Test function generating some data.
